videos.description: Notre Dame guard TJ Gibbs tosses the ball ahead to forward Nate Laszewski for a easy layup in transition.
videos.headline: Laszewski sinks layup in transition

videos.description: Notre Dame's Rex Pflueger, John Mooney and Prentiss Hubb quickly gets easy baskets on 3 straight possessions.
videos.headline: Notre Dame scores on 3 straight possessions

videos.description: Oklahoma G Miles Reynolds comes up with a steal and then finds G Aaron Calixte fora 3-pointer in transition.
videos.headline: Reynolds' steal leads to Calixte's 3-pointer

videos.description: Notre Dame's Prentiss Hubb passes the ball to a driving Juwan Durham, who rises up for a powerful one-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Durham flies in for big dunk
